title: Modern Renovation and Excellent Service
text: The most notable thing about our stay at The Halkin was the impeccable service - warm, welcoming and efficient. Our room was a recently renovated junior suite. It was spacious and well appointed. Bathroom was also large and included separate shower and soaking tub. The location, south of Hyde Park, is very quite and a couple of blocks from shopping, pubs and such. If you are looking for a modern 5 star hotel, I would recommend.
